casebody.data:
ALLSCRIPTS HEALTHCARE, LLC
v.
ETRANSMEDIA TECHNOLOGY, INC. 330A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 24, 2017 Shannon R. Joseph, Attorney at Law, John T. Kivus, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Christopher Jackson, Attorney at Law, for Allscripts Healthcare, LLC. Tracie H. Brisson, Attorney at Law, for Etransmedia Technology, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of February 2017 by Dana L. Salazar for Admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of March 2017."
